data.title: touch Labels and Tapes
data.meta_description: Learn more about Brother P-touch Labels and Tapes - all you need to know
data.text:
Brother P-touch label makers use unique and advanced laminated tape technology

Need to Buy Brother P-touch Tapes Now? Click Here

Find technical information for Brother DK Labels here

Brother offers an extensive selection of tape colors, widths, and styles to meet diverse labeling needs. When choosing the right tape, consider your specific application and P-touch model to ensure optimal performance. Our range includes both laminated and non-laminated tapes, each available with different adhesive options to cater to various surfaces and conditions.

Laminated tapes are particularly noteworthy for their resilience. These P-touch tough labels are designed to withstand extreme conditions, such as exposure to heat, cold, moisture, and chemicals. They are ideal for environments that demand durability and longevity.

Non-laminated tapes, on the other hand, are perfect for general use, providing a cost-effective solution for everyday labeling tasks. The variety of adhesives available ensures that whether you need a strong bond for textured surfaces or a flexible tape for wrapping around cables, there’s a Brother tape that meets your needs.

The comprehensive information provided on our site will guide you in selecting the most appropriate tape for your specific requirements. By understanding the unique features and benefits of each tape type, you can make an informed decision that enhances the efficiency and longevity of your labeling projects.

View the TZ Product Safety Information Sheet (PSIS) and Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS)

Brother P-touch TZe tapes are the only tapes available that have a unique lamination, which makes the labels heat, cold, water, chemical and fade resistant (perfect for use outdoors, cold environments and near food). The Brother labels are extremely durable, have a professional finish and will outlast other labels.

With over 100 tz tape and m tape colors and widths to choose from, getting organized is now easy. Here are some popular label searches.

There is a variety of P-touch tape types, colors and sizes to choose from to suit the P-touch electronic labeler you are using.

1. Brother Ptouch Tape Types:

Laminated tape - TZe Series Tapes:

Laminated tape is super versatile and sticks to almost any surface, making it incredibly durable so it can handle scrapes and abrasions with ease. Plus, TZe Tapes are water-resistant, so you can use it both indoors and outdoors without worry. Spills? No problem! Whether it's water, oil, or chemicals, this label tape shrugs it off. It also won't fade under harsh UV rays. And it stays put in hot and cold environments, from freezers to microwaves. Brother really knows their stuff when it comes to laminated tapes – these labels are P-touch tough!

Resistant to Elements: Stands up to water, sunlight, chemicals, heat, and cold.

Versatile Adhesion: Can stick to virtually any surface.

Durable Quality: Won’t fade or tear, ensuring longevity.

Indoor and Outdoor Use: Perfect for both indoor (microwaves, freezers) and outdoor applications.

Clean Removal: Labels do not leave a sticky residue when removed, leaving a smooth, clean surface.

UV Resistant: Maintains clarity and color even under harsh UV rays.

Abrasion Resistant: Withstands scrapes and abrasions, ideal for high-traffic areas.

Temperature Tolerant: Performs reliably in extreme temperatures, from freezers to hot environments.

Oil and Chemical Resistant: Suitable for industrial environments where exposure to oils and chemicals is common.

Professional Finish: Provides a sleek, professional look for all labeling needs.

Non-laminated M Series Tape (M tape)

Ideal for General Indoor Use: Perfect for everyday labeling needs around the home or office.

Variety of Colors: Available in a wide range of colors to suit different preferences and applications.

Cost-Effective: Offers an affordable solution for regular labeling tasks.

Easy to Use: Simple to install and compatible with a variety of P-touch label makers.

Clear and Legible: Provides crisp, easy-to-read text for effective organization.

Customizable: Available in multiple widths to accommodate different labeling requirements.

Adhesive Strength: Offers reliable indoor adhesion on smooth, flat surfaces.

Residue-Free Removal: Labels can be removed cleanly, leaving no sticky residue behind.

Versatile Applications: Great for labeling files, folders, shelves, containers, and more.

The diagram below shows the composition of a Brother P-touch laminated tape:

Fluorescent TZe Tape

This TZe tape features a vibrant background that stands out much more than standard color tape, making it incredibly eye-catching. Here are some of the best uses for this label tape:

Warning and Instruction Labels: Perfect for factories, ensuring safety messages and instructions are clearly visible.

Advertising Labels: Ideal for stores, helping promotions and important information grab attention.

Signs and Notices: Great for creating signs and notices that need to be noticed quickly and easily.

Enhanced Visibility: Ensures that crucial information is easily seen, improving safety and communication in various environments.

Iron on Fabric tape

This tape is made from cloth so that after letters are printed on it, an iron can be used to stick this tape to some other piece of cloth.

This tape allows letters to be printed on it to be transferred by ironing to a piece of fabric. It can be used to place the names on smooth surface fabric like the 100% cotton used in uniforms. Clothing with letters transferred to it can be dry-cleaned, or washed.

Tape is made from cloth and allows users to produce iron-on labels for clothing

Clothing with Iron on Fabric tape can be dry cleaned
